Package de.sander.til

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MenuListener  
    SettingsListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorController
    This class controls the color chooser view.
    ColorView  
    MenuController
    This class controls the menu bar and listens for menu actions
    MenuView
    A MenuView builds a menu bar from a PrimeModel.
    PrimeApplication
    This class loads the settings and models and creates a view controller for every model.
    PrimeController
    The PrimeController controls a PrimeView.
    PrimeExplorer
    This class is used to create and run the application
    PrimeModel
    This class stores the state of a PrimeView.
    Primes
    TODO: group divisor sums by exponents
    PrimeTest  
    PrimeUtil
    This class provides some static auxiliary functions
    PrimeView
    A PrimeView renders the content of a prime model.
    Settings  
    StateLoader
    A StateLoader is used to load settings and models from json files
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MenuListener.MenuAction
    this enum defines all actions of a menu
    PrimeModel.PMMode
    A enumeration of control modes (key: +/-).
    PrimeModel.PMView
    A enumeration of view modes (keys: up/down/left/right).
